description.value: You move to provide immediate care to those who need it. You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Stride], then use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Battle Medicine] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Treat Poison]. You can spend 2 actions for Doctor's Visitation to instead Stride and then use either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Administer First Aid] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Treat Condition] (if you have that feat).
